issue.title: [CF 1450] TMW dissapear when in combat sometimes.
issue.body:
So my TMW is dissapearing when i'm in combat sometimes.

These are my conditions. can anyone help me out?
It sucks when i cant see my TMW as a healer in mid fight on myth :/

https://imgur.com/a/RMAhA


> Posted by CurseForge user vlamerboy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1450 | Raw

comments.body:
What are you expecting that first condition to do? You haven't entered in the name of any timer to check.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
